description.narrative: District-level public stakeholder meetings (involving local authorities, schools, civil society organisations, community leaders, ex-Kamaiya leaders and parent representatives) to explore local-level problems preventing ex-Kamaiya educational and livelihood rights being realised (including non-receipt of ex-Kamaiya rehabilitation entitlements), and proposing solutions.

participating-org.narrative: World Vision Advocacy Forum (WVAF) Partner organization and Backward Society Education (BASE)

activity-date.narrative: 15 times in each working district, District level stakeholder meeting has beed conducted and completed in total.
